attributes.action: Stay in isolation until you are negative if you test positive for COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: Many people strongly believe it is unsafe and will cause a large risk to vulnerable groups if people can walk around with Covid-19
attributes.background: Stop the ending of all Covid-19 restrictions and if you test positive for Covid-19 you must stay at home until you are negative.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606834
